html:
2025-0593
2025-07-30FIN, GACCustoms TariffOrder Amending the Order Imposing a Surtax on the Importation of Certain Steel GoodsOrder Amending the Order Imposing a Surtax on the Importation of Certain Steel Goods in order to (1) apply a 50 per cent surtax to specified steel goods corresponding to imports above the 2024 volume threshold for the Free Trade Agreement (FTA) partners, with the exception of the United States and Mexico, as well as and non-FTA partners; (2) restructure the five broad steel product categories to 23 new product subcategories; and (3) ensure that the maximum cumulative tariff that can be applied to imports of steel goods cannot exceed 50 percent.Registration: SOR/2025-0155 Publication Date: 2025-08-13
subject: Order Amending the Order Imposing a Surtax on the Importation of Certain Steel Goods
precis: Order Amending the Order Imposing a Surtax on the Importation of Certain Steel Goods in order to (1) apply a 50 per cent surtax to specified steel goods corresponding to imports above the 2024 volume threshold for the Free Trade Agreement (FTA) partners, with the exception of the United States and Mexico, as well as and non-FTA partners; (2) restructure the five broad steel product categories to 23 new product subcategories; and (3) ensure that the maximum cumulative tariff that can be applied to imports of steel goods cannot exceed 50 percent.
